values.help:
Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4.11 below.
	  This is used to reduce network traffic.
values.label: Report threshold

values.help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Whole Smart Strip).
values.label: Whole Smart Strip Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)

values.help: Defines the automated status notification of an associated device when status changes
values.label: Notification status

values.help: Get temperature of Smart Strip
values.label: Temperature of Smart Strip

values.help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Default Group Reports

values.help:
Configure auto report which information as Group 1.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1

values.help:
Configure auto report which information as Group 2.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2

values.help:
Configure auto report which information as Group 3.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3

values.help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Set 111-113 to default
